title: Video: Former R.I. mayoral candidate taunts police during drunk driving arrest
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime “I told my kids if they ever became a cop, I’d kill ’em,” Maria Bucci allegedly told the officer who arrested her.
“Only clowns become a cop.
” Maria Bucci, a former candidate for mayor of Cranston, Rhode Island, was arrested in East Greenwich last week on suspicion of drunk driving.

title: N.J. police chief pleads not guilty to kidnapping, domestic violence charges after alleged incident at Back Bay hotel
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime Carmen Veneziano is accused of pinning a woman to a bed and head-butting her during a trip to Boston in September.
By Abby Patkin December 23, 2025 | 1:38 PM 4 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A New Jersey police chief pleaded not guilty to domestic violence charges Monday after prosecutors accused him of assaulting a woman at a Back Bay hotel early this year.

title: American Airlines is adding 2 domestic routes from Boston in 2026, including a nearby island destination
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights The flights begin June 18, 2026.
Brant Point Lighthouse on Nantucket handout By Kristi Palma December 23, 2025 | 11:56 AM 1 minute to read Boston travelers will have another way of getting to Nantucket for summer fun in 2026.
American Airlines is adding two domestic routes from Logan Airport next summer: to Nantucket and Madison, Wisconsin, the airline announced on Thursday.
